item.title: I have a problem with adding npcs
item.dc:creator: @vbcoderx vbcoderx
item.description:
@vbcoderx wrote:

just because its down, doesn’t give you the right to read the rules…

Rule 8:
Nothing to do with private servers belongs on moparisthebest.com, use moparisthebest.com/smf for these things.

as this is is moparisthebest, i advise you to take speljohan’s advice…

Read full topic

item.description:

Now i compile and gointo my server… Spawn the NPC and the npc isnt there. The NPC doesnt show. Can anyone understand my problem and help me?
[/quote] well i guess this isnt going to be used, Lock this

read the rules… all server related stuff belongs on http://moparisthebest.com/smf[/quote]

Which is down… so someone lock this topic

item.title: I have a problem with adding npcs
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

Hi, I have the new 496 models and i was browsing though them… I picked out the new Giant Rats… It has 4 models My code looks like this:

if(i == 86) { 										// NPC ID
      //---------------------------------------------------
	aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[360];				// Original NPC data, Don't change
	class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); 					// Collect original NPC data, do not change.
	class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];						//
	class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";						// Option

      //----------------------------------------------
	int changedColors = 5; 								// Number of Colors changed
	class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors];					//
	class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors];					//
	class5.anIntArray76[0] = 10304; 						// Original color
	class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; 							// Changed color
	class5.anIntArray76[1] = 10287; 						// Original color
	class5.anIntArray70[1] = 33; 							// Changed color
	class5.anIntArray76[2] = 10270; 						// Original color
	class5.anIntArray70[2] = 33; 							// Changed color
	class5.anIntArray76[3] = 10328; 						// Original color
	class5.anIntArray70[3] = 933; 							// Changed color
	class5.anIntArray76[4] = 10279; 						// Original color
	class5.anIntArray70[4] = 33; 							// Changed color

      //-----------------------------------------
	class5.aString65 = "Giant rat"; 						// Name
	class5.anInt61 = 3; 								// Combat Level
	class5.aByteArray89 = "Remodeled 05/06/2008 - ViruZ3".getBytes();			// Examine

      //-----------------------------------
	class5.anIntArray94 = new int[4]; 						// Number of models 
	class5.anIntArray94[0] = 14002; 						// Model ID
	class5.anIntArray94[1] = 14003; 						// Model ID
	class5.anIntArray94[2] = 14004; 						// Model ID
	class5.anIntArray94[3] = 14005; 						// Model ID
     }

Now i compile and gointo my server… Spawn the NPC and the npc isnt there. The NPC doesnt show. Can anyone understand my problem and help me?

Read full topic
item.source: I have a problem with adding npcs
